PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08432020-10-30ESDC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmployment Equity Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Equity Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT EQUITY REGULATIONS in order to streamline the text, increase clarity, improve data gathering, and reduce reporting burden while introducing amendments to collect salary information in a way that will support the implementation of pay transparency measures among federally regulated private-sector employers as announced in Budget 2018.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0236 Publication Date: 2020-11-25
AttachmentsAttachment
